comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.14) Gecko/20110218 Firefox/3.6.14 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.14) Gecko/20110218 Firefox/3.6.14 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729)

Some input screens feature an Update button. When you create the Update and click Save, updated information does not post.

Some screens do not show the header row - rows display fine in Internet Explorer
More than 45,000 WebEOC users nationwide and we have to tell them that Firefox does not work correctly with this product.

Reproducible: Always

More than 45,000 WebEOC users nationwide and we have to tell them that Firefox does not work correctly with this product.
